entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. A few flurries beginning this morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning then periods of snow. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023
